name: Fear of the Dark (itch) (Jalzu, Lennyi)
description:
You are going to an old ghost house in search of treasures. You have a super flashlight that can show ghosts and different fake things. Very epic.

Credits:

Game made by: JalzuMakesGames & Lennyi

All sound effects from freesound.org

Music was made by us
